description_top: Asher ben Yehiel's Piske ha-Rosh or Hilkhot ha-Rosh
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Asher ben Yehiel's Piske ha-Rosh or Hilkhot ha-Rosh
author: Asher ben Jehiel
description: Hilkhot ha-Rosh on Berakhot, Avodah Zarah, Hulin, Berkhorot and the small treatises with glosses (by Israel of Kremz and others). Written for Manoaḥ ben Avraham.
